description: Universal Charge Line information. Each row represents one UCL transaction.

columns.name: UCL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the charge line record.

columns.name: CHARGE_STAGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the current stage for the charge.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Pre-Handler Review


Charge Handler


Destination Router


Destination Filer


Post-Handler Review


Pre-Process


Repost Review


Triggered

columns.name: CREATED_IN_RTR_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the charge was created by the charge router.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: CREATED_FROM_UCL_ID
columns.description: The charge from which this charge was created. This means that whenever a charge is generated from another charge, this item will represent the charge it was created from. If a charge is created manually in the editor, this item will not be set since it wasn't created from another charge.

columns.name: THIRD_PTY_ELIG_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the charge is third party eligible. This is used by lab charges.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PRO_HOSP_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The professional billing hospital account tied to the visit for the guarantor account.

columns.name: PRO_VIS_NUM
columns.description: The current professional billing visit for the guarantor account.

columns.name: RESEARCH_ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the research study association linked to this charge.

columns.name: ORIG_BILL_AREA_ID
columns.description: The item stores the original value of provider bill area.

columns.name: ORIG_BILL_AREA_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME
columns.description: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.
